page.title: 14STANWICK FETE
page.content: Stanwick fete is held on the first Saturday of June every year.It is organized by the chairman of the fete committee.600 to 700 people generally attend the fete.There are around 20 stalls.The money which was raised this year,(Â£900) goes mainly to the Stanwick church restoration fund.Some of the main attractions are the gymkhana and the dog show.Some of the main problems are the weather and the lack of help.The fete was first held in 1971 and it was Mr. Allybones idea.Very few people help with the clearing up.Mr. Marks supplies the jumps and bales for the gymkhana.The fete started when Mr.Allybones and the church talked about ways to raise money for the old school rooms which were falling down.
